content-security-policy.value: default-src 'self';style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://fonts.googleapis.com;style-src-elem 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com;script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';script-src-attr 'unsafe-inline';font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com;img-src 'self' data: https:;connect-src 'self';base-uri 'self';form-action 'self';frame-ancestors 'self';object-src 'none';upgrade-insecure-requests
